publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1910 Pauline McNeill on behalf of the Justice 2 Committee: The Draft Sex Offenders (Notice Requirements) (Foreign Travel) (Scotland) Regulations 2001â€”That the Justice 2 Committee agrees that its debate at its next meeting on motion S1M-1905 to approve the draft Sex Offenders (Notice Requirements) (Foreign Travel) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 be limited to 45 minutes.
